== '''Radiation related variables and settings in 3D and in MUSC''' ==

LDSL, LDSH, LDSV - these are related to Laura's orography-related changes. If set to False, her settings are not use.

NAERHS - aerosols in relation to the use of the HLRADIA radiation scheme (1 = switch to old SW aerosols in HLRADIA i.e. tuned constants).

LREADAB - set to False if using cy43 PGD files; true for 38 (it relates to the treatment of shadow factor elements in LR's orog work)
